questions_and_notes: Can we report "where land" instead.  Note daily precip. as rain is reported "where land".  Won't quite give the same answer when data are regridded.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: time: mean where crops (comment: mask=cropFrac)
comment: includes both liquid and solid phases
